definition: to cure ills with poison (TCM)/to fight evil with evil/set a thief to catch a thief/to fight fire with fire
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]

sentences.english: My uncle lost out to his competitors because he wasn't willing to fight fire with fire.
sentences.chinese: 我叔叔输给了竞争对手，因为他不愿意以毒攻毒。

sentences.english: The cure is in the poison.
sentences.chinese: 治愈的方法是以毒攻毒。

sentences.english: Homeopathic treatment is based on the "like cures like" principle .
sentences.chinese: 顺势疗法是基于“以毒攻毒”的原理。

sentences.english: Old iron understand, this call black eat black, combat poison with poison.
sentences.chinese: 老铁明白，这叫黑吃黑，以毒攻毒。

sentences.english: Inside the viper's nest, you must be viper, too.
sentences.chinese: 要想在毒蛇的巢穴中生存，你就必须以毒攻毒。

definition: draw out pus by applying a plaster to the affected area
good medicine tastes bitter (idiom); fig. frank criticism is hard to swallow
to harm sb/to inflict suffering/to victimize/pernicious
to detoxify/to relieve fever (in Chinese medicine)
to let blood (Chinese medicine)/to bleed/to stab sb (slang)
to prescribe medicine/to poison/to slip a drug (into sb's drink etc)
see 無可救藥|无可救药[wu2 ke3 jiu4 yao4]
